data.title: Who is Usher Married To and Does He Have Children?
data.meta_description: Does Usher have a wife? Does he have a girlfriend? How many children does Usher have? Here's everything you need to know.
data.text:
Is Usher married and does he Have a Wife?

As of February 2024, Usher is said to have married his long-term girlfriend Jennifer Goicoechea following his Super Bowl performance in February 2024.

A rep confirmed to People that Usher and Jennifer "took the next step in their relationship and did get married on Sunday night in Las Vegas surrounded by close friends and family".

He previously wed fashion stylist to Jay-Z, Ciara and Mary J. Blige, Tameka Foster in 2007, but filed for divorce two years later.

He later married life coach Grace Miguel in 2015, but later divorced in 2018, but is off the market as he has a girlfriend.

Does Usher have a girlfriend? Meet Jenn Goicoechea

Usher currently has a girlfriend-turned-wife who he has been dating since late 2019.

She is a record executive named Jenn Goicoechea, and first sparked dating rumours in June 2019 after they were photographed together at a birthday party.

Goicoechea started her career by working as an assistant for singer Ciara, and is now Senior Vice President of A&R at Epic Records.

According to this tabloid, Usher obtained a marriage license in Clark County, Las Vegas, just days before his Super Bowl performance after taking advice from his spiritual advisor.

The wedding is said to have been an intimate affair attended by close friends and family, with Jenn and Usher having been dating since late 2018.

How many kids does Usher have?

R&B Singer Usher has four children with two different women.

His older children, Usher "Cinco" Raymond V, and Naviyd Ely Raymond, were born in 2007 and 2008 with ex-wife Tameka Foster.

Upon his marriage to Foster, Usher became a stepfather to Foster's three sons between 2007 and 2009.

His third child, a daughter, Sovereign Bo, was born in September 2020 with girlfriend Jenn Goicoechea.

They later welcomed their second child together, son Sire Castrello, in September 2021.
